content: As an AI language model, it's difficult for me to make a personalized recommendation without knowing your specific preferences. However, based on the overall ratings and reviews from various sources, Franklin Barbecue is regarded as one of the best BBQ joints in Austin and is definitely worth checking out if you're willing to travel for BBQ. The lines for Franklin Barbecue can be quite long, so plan accordingly. That being said, all of the BBQ joints mentioned earlier are highly praised and considered some of the best in Austin, so you really can't go wrong with any of them!
